message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $100?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've already made a significant concession from my initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final counteroffer.
